Title: National Public Transport Access Nodes (NaPTAN)
Description: The data set contains the location of public transport access points. This includes bus stops, ferry terminals, airports, rail stations, coaches, trams, underground and metro stations.

Title: OS MasterMap Highways Network - Roads
Description: Road and path network dataset for Great Britain. It records the dimensions and accessibility of roads.

Title: Traveline National Dataset (TNDS)
Description: Dataset of scheduled bus, tram, and light rail services

Title: Bristol traffic count data
Description: Hourly traffic flow data from re - purposed SCOOT traffic counters. These are induction loop counters embedded in roads that detect when a vehicle passes that point. They do not discriminate between vehicle types.

Title: AADT / AADF count data
Description: Average daily traffic count data by count point and vehicle type

Title: STATS19
Description: Recorded road traffic accident statistics

Title: Local bus passenger journeys (BUS01)
Description: Total bus passengers by local authority (England)

Title: Journey Time Statistics (JTS)
Description: Journey time statistics to destinations - national dataset by local authority

Title: Road condition statistics (DfT)
Description: Data about the condition and maintenance of roads by local authority and Highways England, produced by Department of Transport.

Title: Road length statistics (RDL)
Description: Data on road length by region, country, road type and local authority

Title: OS MasterMap Highways Network - Paths
Description: GIS Line network of urbans paths, with classifications

Title: OS Open Roads
Description: GIS Line network of roads, with classifications (open data source)
File format: Vector Tiles, GeoPackage, GML 3.2, Esri Shape file

Title: Bus passengers by population
Description: Bus passenger trips by head of population by local authority (Enland)

Title: Traveline Public Transport Timetable Data
Description: Dataset of public transport timetable data (more recent data available)

Title: Rail Passenger usage (entries and exits)
Description: Rail passenger numbers by rail station (including interchange)

Title: UK local authority and regional greenhouse gas emissions
Description: A breakdown of greenhouse gas emissions by Local Authority area

Title: TEMPRO 7.2 and NTEM data
Description: Indicative trip forecasting by mode and area to 2050 (soon to be superceeded by v8)

Title: Transport use during the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic
Description: To monitor the use of the transport system during the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, DfT provides statistics on transport use by mode.

Title: Car ownership by Household (2011 Census)
Description: 2011 census data of car ownership by household

Title: Economic Activity (2011 Census)
Description: 2011 census data of economic activity by household

Title: Location of usual residence and place of work by method of travel to work (2011 Census)
Description: 2011 census data of travel to work (TTW) areas origins and destinations

Title: Geology (625k resolution)
Description: Geoglogical survey data of local geology

Title: English indices of deprivation 2019
Description: Index of multiple deprivation, including subset data and IMD segmentation

Title: Flood Risk areas
Description: Flood risk mapping by flood risk zone

Title: Primary Schools
Description: Primary schools by school census data

Title: Secondary Schools
Description: Secondary schools by school census data

Title: General Practitioner's (GPs) surgeries
Description: Registered General Practitioner locations

Title: Hospital Locations
Description: Location of hospitals with a Accident and Emergency department

Title: OS AddressBase
Description: Royal Mail Individual addresses/properties

Title: OS AddressBasePlus
Description: Royal Mail Individual addresses/properties with additional land use data

Title: OS AddressBasePremium
Description: Royal Mail Individual addresses/properties with detailed land use data

Title: OS Boundary Line
Description: Collection of boundary datasets, including local authority boundaries and geodemographic boundaries

Title: OS Codepoint
Description: Postcode point data

Title: OS Codepoint Poly
Description: Postcode polygon data

Title: OS Terrain 5
Description: Terrain height data at 10m resolution (incomplete)

Title: OS Terrain 50
Description: Terrain height data at 50m resolution (incomplete)

Title: UrbanFreight
Description: Data received from the UrbanFreight project

Title: BODS location data
Description: This catalogue contains the live locations of buses within Bus Open Data Service

Title: BODS fare data
Description: This catalogue contains fares data for operators within Bus Open Data Service.

Title: BODS timetable data
Description: This contains a detailed granular view of the timetable data within Bus Open Data Service.

Title: Bristol car club bays
Description: Car bay locations for various car clubs operating in the West of England, such as Zipcar and Co-wheels

Title: Bristol Car Park locations
Description: Locations of car parks in Bristol, including Park and Ride car parks. Attributes include car park type, number of spaces, operating times

Title: Bristol Cycle Network Map
Description: A database of existing and proposed cycle routes in Bristol, used by BCC for maintaining and planning the cycle network. It includes the strategic cycle network, location of cycling infrastructure, vehicle and cycle flows, and proposed schemes.

Title: Bristol Traffic Counters
Description: Locations and meta data for traffic counters. These are induction loops in the road that detect the passing vehicles but don't discriminate between vehicle types.

Title: Electric Vehicle Charging Points
Description: Location and details of electric vehicles charging points in Bristol

Title: Bristol traffic accidents
Description: Bristol road accidents involving personal injury that were reported to police and passed on to the City Council. Damage only accidents are not recorded

Title: Road traffic statistics
Description: Bulk download traffic figures for all regions, all local authorities and all count point locations.

Title: WebTRIS
Description: National Highways MIDAS site flow reports accessible through web portal or API

Title: National Charge Point Registry
Description: A real-time view of Publicly Accessible PiV (plugged-in vehicle) Charge Points within the UK.

Title: National Travel Survey
Description: Statistics and data about the National Travel Survey, based on a household survey to monitor trends in personal travel.

Title: Road freight: domestic and international statistics
Description: Data and statistics about domestic and international road freight activity

Title: Business Register and Employment Survey data
Description: Business Register and Employment Survey data - Annual employee and employment estimates for Great Britain and UK split by region. Results given by full-time/part-time and public/private splits.

Title: Active Lives Survey
Description: Data of walking and cycling activity within the population for recreation
